settings.content: The 'List Collections' template shows all of your collections and is availble at yourshop.com/collections

settings.label: Featured collection
settings.info: If a link list of collections is selected then the list collections template will show just the collections in this list. If it is set to none or the link list is empty then the template will show all collections.

settings.label: Allow collections to be filtered by more than one tag
settings.info: If left unchecked collections will be filtered by only one tag at a time

settings.content: You can allow users to switch between different collection templates while viewing your site. To enable this you must have at least one template selected other than your default template.
